description: In this step, increase the dimensions of the output grid to three times the size of the input grid.

Building on Step 1, take each cell from the input grid and replicate it into a 3x3 block in the output grid. This means that for every individual cell in the input, you will fill a corresponding 3x3 area in the output, effectively enlarging the input by three times its original size.

Building on Step 2, take each 3x3 cell in the output grid and fill it with the corresponding 3x3 section from the original input grid. This means that for every enlarged cell in the output, you will directly paste the original 3x3 input without any modifications. Ensure that each section aligns correctly to maintain the overall structure of the grid.
